sourcesContent:
<template>
  <NavBar />
  <ShowProduct :product_name="object_product.product_name" :seller_avatar="object_product.seller_avatar"
    :seller_name="object_product.seller_name" :product_desc="object_product.product_desc"
    :product_image="object_product.product_image" :seller_id="object_product.seller_id"
    :product_id="object_product.product_id" />
</template>

<script>
import NavBar from '@/components/NavBar.vue'
import ShowProduct from '@/components/ShowProduct.vue'
import axios from 'axios'

export default {
  name: 'ProductView',
  components: {
    NavBar,
    ShowProduct
  },
  data() {
    return {
      id: '',
      object_product: {}
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    // axios.post('/products_searching_by_id', {
    //   id: this.id
    // })
    //   .then(response => {
    //     this.object_product = response.data
    //   })

    axios.post('/products_searching_by_id', {
      id: this.id
    }).then(response => {
      this.object_product = response.data
    })
  }
}
</script>
